  • Pack 198
    Ted Sumner • Jun 13, 2015

    I developed a web site for Cub Scout Pack 198 in Portland, Oregon. It was built using PHP and Sass with Compass. I utilized modern CSS such as flex boxes and gradients to create a modern, mobile first site.

  • Bible Word Study
    Ted Sumner • Jun 13, 2015

    Bible Word Study is a site I developed using the Joomla CMS and the Helix 3 framework. It is a full featured site with a forum, blog, calendar, and articles. The forum and calendars have a mix of private and public sections so private information can be shared with specific groups as well as having public interaction.
